attributes.action: I want people in the north east and England to have the same pay as other places
attributes.background: I want them to acknowledge that people in the care sector deserve to be paid higher than what they get now 11.94 is disgusting

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for staff in the care sector are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase the national minimum wage, if that's something you want to happen.
